title: How do I disable key press vibration?
answer:
You can turn off key press vibration only if your phone's Vibrate on touch has been turned on. To turn off key press vibration, do as follows: 

 On the home screen, touch Settings. Touch Sound > Vibrate on touch. 

 [Go back to Settings. Touch Language & input, then ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109392) on the right of Huawei Swype. From the displayed option menu, choose Settings and turn off Vibrate on keypress.]()
